solution_line_template: There are {total_students_combined}/{num_sections} = <<{total_students_combined}/{num_sections}={students_per_section_after_transfer}>>{students_per_section_after_transfer} students in each section now.

So, there were {students_per_section_after_transfer} - {students_transferred_to_diligence} = <<{students_per_section_after_transfer}-{students_transferred_to_diligence}={diligence_students_before_transfer}>>{diligence_students_before_transfer} students in section Diligence before {students_transferred_to_diligence} students were transferred in their section.
